name: Groupedlist
short_description: Dropdown list of grouped custom entries.

properties1.name: name
properties1.description: (mandatory) is the unique name of the field.

properties2.name: label
properties2.description: (mandatory) (translatable) is the descriptive title of the field.

properties3.name: description
properties3.description: (optional) (translatable) is text that will be shown as a tooltip when the user moves the mouse over the drop-down box.

properties4.name: message
properties4.description: (optional) (translatable) is text that will be shown as error on validation.

properties5.name: class
properties5.description: (optional) is a CSS class name for the HTML form field. If omitted this will default to 'inputbox'.

properties6.name: multiple
properties6.description: (optional) is whether multiple items can be selected at the same time (true or false).

properties8.name: required
properties8.description: (optional) The field must be filled before submitting the form.

properties9.name: validate
properties9.description: (optional) The validation method for the form field.  This value will determine which method is used to validate the value for a field.

properties10.name: option
properties10.description: (mandatory) set the options of this radio. Separate options with commas and use the pipe symbol to separate value from text.

properties11.name: useglobal
properties11.description: (optional)  if set to true, it will show the value that is set in the global configuration if found in the database.

properties12.name: default
properties12.description: (optional) is the default list item value.

properties13.name: showon
properties13.description: (optional) Allows you to hide the field based on the value(s) of another field; for Joomla 3.2.4+ https://joomla.stackexchange.com/a/17682/2166

description: The groupedlist form field type provides a drop down list or list box of custom-defined entries, organized into labeled groups. If the field has a saved value, this is selected when the page is first loaded. If not, the default value (if any) is selected.
